CustomField.description: Ticks the box if the activity is this year to calculate number of meeting YTD
CustomField.formula: IF( or( YEAR(ActivityDate) = YEAR(TODAY()), YEAR(ActivityDate) = YEAR(TODAY()+1), YEAR(ActivityDate) = YEAR(TODAY()+2), YEAR(ActivityDate) = YEAR(TODAY()+3)), 1,0)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Ticks the box if the activity is this year to calculate number of meeting YTD
CustomField.label: Activity YTD
